content: We achieved nearly $2 billion in total net sales in the fourth quarter, up more than 14% on a per day basis year-over-year as higher average selling prices for our products drove sales growth in all three lines of business. We are continuing to invest in projects related to our sales organization, customer experience initiative, pricing tools, e-commerce and branch optimization -- these and other Ambition 2025 investments totaled approximately $11 million within the operating expense line in the third quarter. I mean, the overall levels of market demand, while down from the last year, 2 years, there's high levels relative to pre-pandemic and we think they're constructive markets. I mean, correct me if I'm wrong, but it sounds like you're planning then for a volume environment that's down maybe mid- to high single digits on a blended basis, you're guiding to sales growth of 2% to 4% acquisitions adding a few percent.
